attributes.action: Give Claudio Ranieri a knighthood in the next Honours List!
attributes.background: What Ranieri has done for Leicester City Football Club is a phenomenal achievement. He should be recognised for his enormous contribution to football's greatest ever story!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
